name: One Afternoon At Kat's
description:
oh god. this is the most abominative thing i have ever made.

so yeah, this is also made in scratch so ofc it has a lot of limitations but i tried, and definetly without tutorials.. haha...

Listen to phone guy for tips, if you dont understand what he's saying. brother u need to focus more. yes even more than school if u wanna beat it. it is really simple, if u still bad at it. focus on it more than your life.

i might add an android port. idk.

EDIT - I added an android port! yaaay! enjoy!

VERY IMPORTANT NOTE FOR ANDROID USERS!! - 

Look, it will say this file might be harmful while downloading, dont worry, its not. it just says that because i had to turn it into and android app in a different way because idk how to make android games. also, to use the arrows and stuff, swipe the screen... you can click on them but sometimes that doesn't work. ok that's all! have fun by torturing yourself by playing this shitty game!!! 

but if you like it, please share this to support me.
